comments.author: Charles-Tim

comments.author: btcpepa04
comments.body: No its a seed bitcoin i generated i will take time to generate

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: What kind of service that is? Are you okay? It's kinda madness selling seeds. Who is the stupid who will buy seed phrases for Electrum and let you scam? Guys don't be a fool. Just create your own wallet and keep safe your seed phrase. The seed phrase isn't purchasable or transferable. You will lose your life savings. OP is a scammer and trying to deceive you.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: btcpepa04 on August 25, 2022, 02:26:16 PMNo its a seed bitcoin i generated i will take time to generate Nobody is going to buy a service they can just do for free, unless you are selling seed phrases with balance, which is illogical and unsafe because there is no guarrantee that you won't steal it from under their noses.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: What kind of "service" is being offered? As I understand it, are you trying to sell something that is obviously being stolen from someone else or am I wrong?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Checked OP's profile and saw this QuoteThis user recently woke up from a long period of inactivity. I  also checked his posts and the style of posting is very much different from way back this could be a hacked or a sold account, I don't know but the easiest way to get tagged is to post something like this, this account is already a member account with over 200 posts he understands that there's no way you can sell a seed wallet or offer a brute force attack, the poster just wants to bust this account.

comments.author: TheBeardedBaby
comments.body: Wait,  does this mean that he is generating 12 random words from a seed dic and had some hits?So why would he sell the seeds if he has the control over the adresses which supposedly have bitcoin in them?I don't get it and it seems I'm not the only one.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Of all the places he choose Bitcointalk where everything about Bitcoin is talked about, this is the easiest way to get tagged posting stuff like this I'll understand if it comes from a newbie, but a member account with hundreds of posts something is wrong with that account, it's hard to believe when you reach a member account here and you acted like you just discover bitcoin today.
